06 May 2015
Cappadocia, part III - The MOST pretty places!

Oh dear, this article is going to be heavy on the images… The next day, Marc and I met Michael (from Poland) over breakfast. The three of us decided to go for a casual morning hike in one of the valleys (Kiliclar vadisi). The weather was gorgeous and the three of us picked a route which followed almost none of the suggested paths.


Until next time,
Arne
